EmailTemplate.subject: Event Reminder: IntApp Webinar Login Information...
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
IntApp- Webinar Confirmation
Hi, Thanks for registering for the "Not @ILTA" Webinar Series. Today's topic is Taking the Pain out of Attorney Provisioning. It will start in half an hour, at 9am Pacific / 12pm Eastern (5pm BST) today. Video and audio access instructions are below:
Webinar Title: Taking the Pain out of Attorney Provisioning
Video:
Conference URL: https://www.livemeeting.com/cc/vcc/join?id=w1810534&role=attend&pw=A181053
Meeting ID: w1810534 Entry Code: A181053
Audio:
Conference Audio Dial In
US/Canada: 888-352-6806 UK: 0-800-404-7656 Passcode: 1810534
Please log in and dial the conference audio line 5-10 minutes prior to the start time.
